415458524_13189124033.title: Help! I‚Äôm stranded!
415458524_13189124033.content:
First time booking through this app. It suggested a flight with a layover. The layover required me to go between terminals to get to my next flight. 

Skyscanner messed up by even suggesting this flight. There was NO WAY I was going to make it to the other terminal with the time I had. 

Now I‚Äôve missed my flight and neither airline will refund me or put me on a different booking because neither believes they‚Äôre at fault. 

So now I‚Äôm stuck in the layover city with no flight to my destination and no way back home. 

Thanks Skyscanner!!

415458524_13141875419.title: USED to be great
415458524_13141875419.content: I started using this app almost from the time it came available. It was a great way to source and book flights. Unfortunately now, when getting the price,  it‚Äôs easy to get excited about the app showing great prices only to find out they are from some obscure 3rd party vendor located in the Czech Republic (kiwi.com)  The ‚Äòreal‚Äô airline prices are much higher and you can‚Äôt see them unless you scroll through all the third party offerings.  This makes it extremely hard to compare ‚Äòreal airline‚Äô fares.

415458524_13121723695.title: Great app
415458524_13121723695.content: Efficient, user friendly, definitely recommend this all for all your flight needs

415458524_13121705688.title: Used For Years
415458524_13121705688.content:
I have used Skyscanner for years now. This such an easy way to find flights anywhere in the world. 

The reason I only gave it 4* is because I think it needs at least 2 upgrades. 

1. A way to favorite both airports and airlines. Let‚Äôs face it, most people begin a trip from their local airport. Why not let people favorite at least that one. 

2. We need  way to switch between class of cabins without having to go back to the beginning. Find a way to scroll between first, business, premium economy, and economy all on the same screen. 

Make those changes and this becomes the premiere app for finding flights.

415458524_12859845038.title: Phenomenal App!
415458524_12859845038.content:
Skyscanner‚Ä¶ an app I thought I‚Äôd never use. But when I needed to find a last-minute flight on a budget, it truly came through. From start to finish, they were there every step of the way.

Cheap tickets ‚Äì I was honestly surprised by how affordable the prices were, especially compared to other apps.

Plenty of flight options ‚Äì Whether I wanted direct flights or didn‚Äôt mind a layover, there were tons of choices to match my schedule.

Affordable add-ons ‚Äì Seat upgrades, baggage, and other extras didn‚Äôt feel like a ripoff. They made it easy to customize without overspending.

Seamless third-party support ‚Äì They‚Äôre partnered with services like AirHelp and others, which made any travel hiccups easier to handle.
Travel agents that communicate ‚Äì I even got early check-in and boarding passes sent straight to my email from the travel agent, which was super convenient.

Overall, a must-recommend app for anyone looking to travel smart without the stress. Whether it‚Äôs your first time or you‚Äôre a frequent flyer, Skyscanner has earned a spot on my home screen.

415458524_12835330006.title: GoTo app for finding travel info
415458524_12835330006.content:
I have been using SkyScanner for over five years now and I find it amazingly helpful for finding air flights at reasonable prices with a wide range of filters to screen out undesirable flights. 

SUGGESTION: I think it would be a fabulous addition to allow filtration of flights on desired minimum and maximum connection time. While overall flight time is a meaningful filter, being able to filter on the connection time for 1+ stop flights would make this app a clear winner.

415458524_12632283643.title: Disappointing Experience with Flyin Booked Via Skyscanner
415458524_12632283643.content:
I booked flight through Skyscanner with a company called Flyin. Unfortunately, they took my money without actually booking the ticket. I was told to expect a refund in three working days, and another 5-7  working days with my bank to receive the money on my account. This means i have to wait two weeks to get my money. And three days has been completed and till now they didn‚Äôt initiate the refund from their side.
I escalated thr issue to skyscanner, but they couldn‚Äôt assist as flyin is unresponsive.  This raise concerns about why skyscanner feature such companies if they can‚Äôt ensure customer protection. Moreover, reviews on the apple App store reveal similar issues from over a year ago with no action taken by skyscanner, This lack of accountability is deeply disappointing.
